Review Cycle:
  1. Click an essay in OtherEssays
  2. Hitting yes will assingn you as the reviewer
  3. It will appear in your review list now
  4. Click yes to open it in google docs or
    cancel to finish reviewing the essay
  5. It will disappear from your review list
Feedback Cycle:
  1. Upload a document
  2. It will appear in your feedback list
  3. When someone finishes reviewing your essay
    (coming soon) there will be a checkmark beside it
